amendment.description: To provide for Military Deputies to the Assistant Secretaries of the military departments for acquisition, logistics, and technology matters.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4524 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4524 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Cochran. (consideration: CR S6377-6392; text: CR S6378-6379) To provide for Military Deputies to the Assistant Secretaries of the military departments for acquisition, logistics, and technology matters.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4524 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4524 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Cochran.
